text: Serge Janquin (born August 5, 1943) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Pas-de-Calais department between 1993 and 2017, and was a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche group. He did not run for a sixth term in 2017. Ludovic Pajot from the National Front succeeded him. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Serge Janquin
